程序包 org.apache.giraph.partition

Package of partitioning related objects.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    GraphPartitionerFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Defines the partitioning framework for this application.
    MasterGraphPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Determines how to divide the graph into partitions, how to manipulate partitions and then how to assign those partitions to workers.
    Partition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    A generic container that stores vertices.
    PartitionContext
    PartitionContext allows for the execution of user code on a per-partition basis.
    PartitionOwner
    Metadata about ownership of a partition.
    ReusesObjectsPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Empty interface to characterize Partition implementations that don't keep references to the Vertex objects they are passed.
    WorkerGraphPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Stores the PartitionOwner objects from the master and provides the mapping of vertex to PartitionOwner.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BasicPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Basic partition class for other partitions to extend.
    BasicPartitionOwner
    Basic partition owner, can be subclassed for more complicated partition owner implementations.
    ByteArrayPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Byte array based partition.
    DefaultPartitionContext
    Empty implementation of PartitionContext
    DiskBackedPartitionStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Disk-backed PartitionStore.
    HashMasterPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Master will execute a hash based partitioning.
    HashPartitionerFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Divides the vertices into partitions by their hash code using a simple round-robin hash for great balancing if given a random hash code.
    HashRangePartitionerFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Divides the vertices into partitions by their hash code using ranges of the hash space.
    HashRangeWorkerPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Implements range-based partitioning from the id hash code.
    HashWorkerPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Implements hash-based partitioning from the id hash code.
    PartitionBalancer
    Helper class for balancing partitions across a set of workers.
    PartitionExchange
    Describes what is required to send and wait for in a potential partition exchange between workers.
    PartitionStats
    Used to keep track of statistics of every Partition.
    PartitionStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Structure that stores partitions for a worker.
    PartitionUtils
    Helper class for Partition related operations.
    RangeMasterPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Some functionality is provided, but this is meant for developers to determine the partitioning based on the actual types of data.
    RangePartitionerFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Range partitioning will split the vertices by a key range based on a generic type.
    RangePartitionOwner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>
    Added the max key index in to the PartitionOwner.
    RangePartitionStats<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>
    Same as PartitionStats, but also includes the hint for range-based partitioning.
    RangeSplitHint<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>
    Hint to the RangeMasterPartitioner about how a RangePartitionOwner can be split.
    RangeWorkerPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Range partitioning will split the vertices by a key range based on a generic type.
    SimpleIntRangePartitionerFactory<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Factory for simple range-based partitioners based on integer vertex ids.
    SimpleLongRangePartitionerFactory<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Factory for simple range-based partitioners based on long vertex ids.
    SimplePartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    A simple map-based container that stores vertices.
    SimplePartitionStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    A simple in-memory partition store.
    SimpleRangeMasterPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    A range-based master partitioner where equal-sized ranges of partitions are deterministically assigned to workers.
    SimpleRangeWorkerPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    A range-based worker partitioner where equal-sized ranges of vertex ids are deterministically assigned to partitions.
